entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add an ICorProfiler callback for when an exception goes unhandled #73826
    8.0.0
  • `TarEntry.ExtractToFile` does not set the last write time of the file to the local time #73825
  • Configuring Console Json Formatting with JsonWriterOptions doesn't work with Trimming #73822
    Future
  • System.AccessViolationException in JIT compilation (.NET 7) #73821
  • OpenSslCachedSystemStoreProvider: Determine readlink result whether should be validated or not #73815
  • TimeZoneInfo: Determine readlink result whether should be validated or not #73813
  • Determine readlink result whether should be validated or not #73812
  • MethodInfo.MakeGenericMethod() used for testing throws MissingRuntimeArtifactException on NativeAOT leg #73811
  • Add ability to unit test our custom MS Build tasks #73809
    8.0.0
  • Runtime_72845 timing out in gcstress #73808
    8.0.0
  • [arm64] JIT assertion failures for valid C# code #73804
    7.0.0
  • AccessViolationException should not be catchable #73794
    7.0.0
  • Add more entropy to GetTempFileName() on Windows #73793
  • Compile error in TypeUtilTests.cs: The type 'Uri' exists in both System.Private.Uri and System.Runtime #73792
  • Entry names in tar archive have `\\` instead of a single `\` #73791
  • asan reports mismatched new[] vs delete #73789
  • [API Proposal]: Guid from int128 and Guid to int128 #73781
  • [API Proposal]: Specialized Sql Exception Type for Duplicate Key Values #73779
  • EventLogWatcher's Dispose has unreachable code which will lead to resource leak #73778
  • testhost missing host files when building with different libraries and host configurations #73777
  • [NativeAOT] Timeout: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests #73776
  • LibraryImportGenerator tests failing on big-endian target (ref pointer type mismatch) #73775
  • Codespaces prebuild often fails with msbuild "Child node "2" exited prematurely" #73774
  • [NativeAOT] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerTest_ConnectCallback_Http2.ConnectCallback_UseNamedPipe_Success - Exception #73772
  • [API Proposal]: System.IO.Compression: Exposing Remaining number of Input buffer bytes to support mixed data blocks. #73770
  • Regression from "Mark phase prefetching" #73782
  • Regressions from "More precise writebarrier for regions" #73783
  • Regressions from "make SIP not on by default" #73784
  • Follow up on mono toolchain workload PR feedback #73758
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add "Protected Users" to WellKnownSidType enum #73757
  • ninja: build stopped: subcommand failed. #73755
  • COM event with recursion .net 6 problem #73754
  • `MissingMethodException` created with class+method name constructor has incorrect HRESULT #73750
  • FileSystemWatcher Notifications / Wait for Completion #73746
  • .NET 6 SDK not being recognized on popOS 22.04 #73764
  • [Windows][libs] ControlledExecutionTests.CancelOnTimeout_ThrowFromCatch Assert.True failure #73739
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Add support for WebP image format #31529
    7.0.0
  • Debug logging provider is not writing to /var/log/syslog on Ubuntu 20.04 #53459
    Future
  • Test failure XmlSerializerTests.XmlMembersMapping_With_ChoiceIdentifier #67218
  • .NET 7: Tiered compilation causes high memory usage and slowdown #73324
  • JIT: Convert old-style intrinsics to NamedIntrinsic #52620
    Future
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Diagnostics #72404
    7.0.0
  • [Mono][Perf][Wasm] Regression across many collection related benchmarks #61624
    7.0.0
  • Vector3.Cross calculates wrong value #70391
    6.0.x
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink error handling #71970
    7.0.0
  • Switch expression in C# 8 behaves differently on x86 vs x64 android #68906
    7.0.0
  • Crash while debugging on MacOS #42489
    7.0.0
  • Mismatched targets in clrdefinitions.cmake #73769
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Regression: Crash on running debugger tests on Codespaces #73673
    7.0.0
  • Profiling x64 processes can’t resolve R2R symbols #72578
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'm_comp->lvaGetDesc(m_srcLclNode)->IsAddressExposed()' during 'Optimize index checks' #73628
    7.0.0
  • Application threads deadlock when throwing an exception #61151
    7.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun\\determinism\\crossgen2determinism\\crossgen2determinism.cmd #60382
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices/exceptions/simple/ParallelCrashWorkerThreads/ParallelCrashWorkerThreads.sh #57621
    7.0.0
  • System.MissingMethodException: Method not found: 'Char ByRef System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshalling.Utf16StringMarshaller.GetPinnableReference(System.String)' => System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.FindOne() #73765
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_40444/Runtime_40444/Runtime_40444.sh #50761
    7.0.0
  • Assert: slot_table[slot_index] == nullptr #73692
    7.0.0
  • `slot_table[slot_index] == nullptr` - dynamic atexit destructor for 'WKS::gc_heap::mark_queue #73679
    7.0.0
  • Assert (g_gc_lowest_address <= address) && (address < g_gc_highest_address) File: /__w/1/s/src/coreclr/gc/gc.cpp Line: 3571 #73653
    7.0.0
  • BitIncrement for Half handles negative values incorrectly #62988
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: JsonStringEnumConverter ignores its JsonNamingPolicy during deserialization. #31619
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.StreamTests_Async.HandleCollectionsAsync failing in runtime-extra-platforms #65021
    7.0.0
  • RC2 branding isn't quite correct #60093
    7.0.0
  • JitInfoIsPopulated failed with after is not greater than before #55712
    7.0.0
  • Bug in the .NET Blog https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/ #73690
  • Timeout in WasmTestOnBrowser-subtlecrypto-System.Security.Cryptography.Tests #73771
  • Add constructors (ReadOnly)Span<T> (ref T) #39425
    Future
  • [Android][iOS] Enable HttpClientHandler.DangerousAcceptAnyServerCertificateValidator when using native handlers #68898
    Future
  • Consider annotating TaskCreationOptions.LongRunning as unsupported on browser #44865
    7.0.0
  • Cannot pass byte pointer to array from rust runtime to wasm: TypeError: Buffer is already detached #61600
    7.0.0
  • STJ source generation fails when class contains a property of type JsonSerializerOptions #73371
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/Arm/AdvSimd.Arm64/AdvSimd.Arm64_Part3_r/AdvSimd.Arm64_Part3_r.sh #72824
    7.0.0
  • Using only a static method generates warnings from the ctor #68660
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.FileSystem.Watcher.Tests Fails on iOS, tvOS #51393
    Future
  • When building coreclr in M1 OSX (arm64), the symbols of corprof artifacts is in amd64 NOT arm64 and that causes build error when building a dotnet profiler for m1 environment #72432
    Future
  • [blazor] canot debug blazor client when using custom domain name / "Unbound breakpoint" #73614
  • Consider what a LocalMachine\My X509Store might be on Unix #15377
    Future
  • CI failure: system.security.cryptography.openssl.tests missing libssl #73210
    7.0.0
  • SudoInstall-Package Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives -Version 6.0.0 #73660
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Base64Tests #72866
    7.0.0
  • .NET 7.0 developers can verify more APIs for correct usage to speed up their development #57797
    7.0.0
  • Developers should be guided away from more obsolete APIs in .NET 7 #57207
    7.0.0
  • .NET 7.0 Preview 5 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #70590
    7.0.0
  • .NET 7.0 Preview 4 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #69396
    7.0.0
  • unify ThrowHelper methods #60703
  • Arm64: Environment.ProcessorCount returns wrong value on higher core machine #67180
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests.StringSearch #68031
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT + trimming docs should reflect new TrimMode #72071
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT test ` ThreadLocalStatics.TLSTesting.ThreadLocalStatics_Test` failing on OSX/x64 #73698
  • [NativeAOT] Update help links for RequiresDynamicCode warnings and error messages #69746
    7.0.0
  • Print the qualified name for missing metadata type in exception message #69998
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal] Add cultureName constructors to GeneratedRegex #59492
    7.0.0
  • Crossgen2 determinism issue found in Roslyn #73403
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow for null XmlSerialziers when loading pre-gen from mappings. #73827
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • Fix unnecessary failure when Crossgen'ing dll's without proper Debug Directory data #73824
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary runtime lookup for constrained callvirt #73823
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix ASAN-detected alloc-dealloc mismatch #73820
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Some SIMD-related cleanup #73819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Update Microsoft.DotNet.Build.Tasks.Installers package #73818
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Support parameters of type Enum with icalls #73817
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Show address offsets in hex #73816
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding documentation explaining case-insensitive behavior across engines #73814
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Rename 'up-for-grabs' label to 'help wanted' #73810
    documentation, area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Avoid url string allocation in WebProxy.IsMatchInBypassList #73807
    area-System.Net, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Reset current_no_gc_region_info after leaving no gc region implicitly #73806
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add missing interop doc #73805
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • System.Net.WebProxy Bypass regex list optimization #73803
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Fix `IBinaryInteger.Read***Endian` to accept a `ReadOnlySpan<byte>`. #73802
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add missing doc tags to TimeOnly type. #73801
    area-System.Runtime
  • Only include host.native instead of host in default clr/mono subsets #73800
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Don't truncate the high bits when ldelema index is nint #73799
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Workload promotion #73798
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • COSE: Add APIs needed for countersign #73796
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • Copy the string instead of returning different pointers #73795
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Change OnRemovePerEntryCleanupAction to delete[] its underlying bytes #73790
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add intrinsic for SpanHelpers.Char.IndexOfAny on AArch64 #73788
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [metadata] Do less initialization in mono_class_is_assignable #73786
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] draft #73785
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Mark RunGetBitLengthTestsLarge as outerloop and skipped on unix platforms #73773
    area-System.Numerics
  • Vectorize LastIndexOf and LastIndexOfAnyExcept without code duplication #73768
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Memory
  • Repoint urls in docs #73766
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • No end stream on ws connect and flush every message #73762
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • null check before strcmp() in MemberLoader #73760
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAot] Enable a couple more libs tests #73756
    area-System.Net
  • Support void* to UIntPtr parameter conversion for Invoked method #73748
    area-System.Reflection
  • ignore name mismatch when IgnoreInvalidName is set #73745
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add FEATURE_READONLY_GS_COOKIE for NativeAOT #73744
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging some test failures #73743
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, Future
  • [NativeAOT] Follow up changes for the suspension loop routine. #73741
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • run tests agains staging helix queues #73740
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix auto layout algorithm to compute structure alignment correctly #73738
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add guard word before local var CMiniColDef[9] #73736
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0

Merged

  • fix a couple issues with Microsoft.XmlSerailizer.Generator #73550
    area-Serialization
  • EnableAOTAnalyzer for most of Microsoft.Extensions libraries #73737
    area-Extensions-Primitives
  • [release/6.0] Fix #70391 #73654
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.9
  • Fix handling of no metadata type #73759
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Backport edge case fixes to XxHash32/XxHash64 #73203
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.9
  • [release/6.0] fixed distroRid having the last version digit for alpine (#62942) #70903
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] JIT: Avoid removing multi-use boxes #73014
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.9
  • [release/6.0] [mono][interp] Fix short branches #73010
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 6.0.9
  • [release/6.0] CreateSymbolicLink PInvoke retval must be marshalled as U1 #73004
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.9
  • [release/6.0] Include EventLog.Messages in WindowsDesktop pack #72809
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.9
  • [release/6.0] Support zero-byte reads on raw response streams in SocketsHttpHandler #72804
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.9
  • Update cmake endif statement #73787
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [mono][jit] Fix an infinite loop in the abcrem pass. #72504
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 6.0.9
  • [release/6.0] Fix unwind info capturing in Linux coredumps #72417
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.9
  • [wasm] fix error cases in assets loading #73702
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Port getifaddrs implementation from Xamarin.Android #72097
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, os-android, 6.0.9
  • Properly encode small structs in bitcasts #73717
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Temporarily remove Windows.11.Arm64.Open queue from runtime-extra-platforms #73780
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • consume MsQuic 2.1 for windows ARM64 builds #73713
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Honor naming policy for string enum deserialization #73348
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [6.0] Re-create MultiCoreJIT profile data on profile-use-only mode #71754
    Servicing-approved, area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.9
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Ensure exception_message points to a string #72002
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.9
  • [release/6.0] Work around for UriFormatException caused by \\?\ prefix in the path #71452
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Configuration, 6.0.9
  • [release/6.0] Console.Unix: fix missing terminal configuration on SIGINT/SIGQUIT/SGCONT. #64985
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Console, 6.0.9
  • Ensure BitIncrement/BitDecrement for Half works correctly #73631
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix issues 73653, 73679, 73692 #73761
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove [RequiresPreviewFeatures] from System.Security.Cryptography.Cose #73677
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [libs] Remove JitInfoIsPopulated mobile activeissue #73716
    area-System.Runtime, os-android, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Use `GetTempPath2W` if available. #72452
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Android][iOS] Enable HttpClientHandler.DangerousAcceptAnyServerCertificateValidator when using native handlers #73763
    area-System.Net.Http
  • consume fedora images with msquic updated to 2.1 #73707
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix JSON source gen to work with public context and public types with internal properties #73622
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Disable newly added TraceSource.Config.Tests on NativeAOT #73742
    area-System.Diagnostics.TraceSource
  • [HTTP3] Correctly handle server closing a control stream #73680
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Don't excessively generate default constructors #73683
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] crypto deadlock fix #73537
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • #51393 Skipped tests on MacCatalyst #73684
    area-System.IO
  • Fix generation of .ni.pdb symbols #73747
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr
  • port SpanHelpers.IndexOfAny(ref byte, byte, byte, byte, int) to Vector128/256 #73481
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Ensure methods on different instantiations are reflectable #73749
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • To keep ubsan happy, Use offsetof() rather than legacy equivalent #73657
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Generic attributes handling in CustomAttributeDecoder #73705
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Remove [Serializable] from OptionException #73316
    arch-wasm, area-Host, 7.0.0
  • Add logging callback to DAC EnumMemoryRegion API #73599
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • COSE: Add documentation and exception correction #73394
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Move the XML comments from reference assembly to CoreCLR implementation #73725
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Expand NativeAOT testing platforms #73546
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Account for availability of multiple processor groups on Windows 11+ #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on Node.js #68807
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Get rid of more .NET Nativisms #73612
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable gcstress on osx-x64 #73732
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Adding cultureName to GeneratedRegexAttribute #73490
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Remove non-determinism from R2R field access #73663
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • consume Debian images with updated msquic #73727
    area-System.Net.Quic, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Implement IXmlTextWriterInitializer on the async writer wrapper. #73730
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • [RateLimiting] Add statistics API #72306
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Convert MemoryMarshal.GetArrayDataReference to a JIT intrinsic #72725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Breakpoint set in a invalid line, set it to the next available line #73189
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Introduce a default synchronization context for wasm #72652
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/6.0] Remove 1024 character limit on ODBC connection strings #73155
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Data.Odbc, 6.0.9
  • Port IndexOfAny(ref char, char[1-5], int) to Vector128/256 #73469
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Obsolete XmlSecureResolver #73676
    Security, area-System.Xml, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Update runtime repo to use Preview 7 SDK #72145
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update all of the net 6 packs to be labeled .net6 #73733
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Unmanaged structs are considered blittable if module has `DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute` #73310
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 7.0.0
  • Improve NullabilityInfoContext behavior for ByRef types. #73520
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Port Windows/MSDTC distributed transactions support #72051
    area-System.Transactions
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Add tests and improve binary XmlDictionaryReader performance #73332
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Clean up AOT publish process #73416
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix hang caused by calling Environment.FailFast on multiple threads #72567
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.9
  • [RateLimiting] Update TranslateKey to allow disposal of wrapped limiter #73160
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Copy default value back when Missing.Value is provided as argument #73670
    area-System.Reflection
  • Initialize variable prior to pedantic use. Caught by ubsan on a bool. #73626
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Workload runtimepack 6 #72147
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix NRT annotations for XmlProcessingInstruction #73687
    area-System.Xml, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [armel/Tizen] Skip host from cross-build #73625
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Respect the Keep-Alive response header on HTTP/1.0 #73245
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.9
  • 66163 fatal error xml serializer immutable array #73729
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • Enable inlining P/Invokes into try blocks with no catch or filter clauses V2 #73661
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Port the incremental source generator polyfill code to the 6.0 servicing branch. #72219
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta, 6.0.9
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returning incorrect values for exponents above 1000 #73643
    area-System.Numerics
  • [NativeAOT] Add method parameter names to stack trace if available #73578
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding support to receive evaluationOptions from dap. #71464
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Handle Stream.Length for devices #73708
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Remove ThreadPool native implementation #71719
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Make OCSP Stapling tests more reliable and more diagnosable #73632
    area-System.Net.Security, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • Vectorize IndexOfAnyExcept for four values #73696
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Update for recent compiler changes for ref fields #73466
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • fix handling of client cert on macOS #73574
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • Port SpanHelpers.SequenceCompareTo(ref byte, int, ref byte, int) to Vector128/256 #73475
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Stress crash WIP #72769
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: one-sided inference from unrelated predicates #72979
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure partial Vector256 acceleration is still possible on AVX only hardware #73720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] delete the emitIns_R_R_Imm(). #73509
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 8.0.0
  • support InfiniteTimeSpan in Select #73204
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • port SpanHelpers.IndexOfAny(ref byte, byte, byte, int) to Vector128/256 #73556
    area-System.Memory, 7.0.0
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix component model aot test #73734
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: extend forward sub to local fields #73719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • X509Certificates.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70821
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Bring back readability lost in .Net 6, and stop emitting BOM. #73731
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Use asset loading for dotnet.worker.js; update WasmAppBuilder #73697
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [Android] gRPC client tests #73060
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • WIP: Verify correctness of using mono llvmfullaot with interpreter as a fallback instead of GSHAREDVTs #72443
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
